intro:
👋 Good afternoon! Please answer a few questions.

✍️ This will help us better understand why you are contacting us and assist you more efficiently.
country_question: Which country do you currently live in?
registered_question:
Have you ever registered on international dating sites before?
If yes, please mention which ones.
If no, simply write “No”.
purpose_question:
What is your purpose for joining?
(For example: serious relationship, marriage, friendship, etc.)
thank_you:
❤️ Thank you for your answers!
Click the button below and send us a message so we can get in touch with you.
